channel.title: A Few questions

item.title: A Few questions
item.dc:creator: @NojTB NojTB
item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

  1. How do i import a variable from another java file.
    things i know about this so far:
    -Function (method) must be able to return (void, will not work)

and how do i import all the variables from a .java file with only one class (public) and no functions

  1. how do i make a if function something like this

int x = 10; int y = 30; int z = 100; if (exp == [b]inbetween [/b] x && y); if (level == 1); level++; if (exp == [b]inbetween [/b] y && z); if (level == 2); level++;
things i know about this problem:
-yes i know inbetween wont work thats what im trying to figure out

  • if(exp <= y && exp >= x); wont work because that means every single number in existance!
  • DO NOT worry about the int variables (the exp, and level) at all my server here is working a bit diffreant from what i remember.
    (basicly just help out with the math problem here)
  1. is there a maximum to the amount of coding in a class with no functions? (just pure variable .java file)

Read full topic
